<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Write NumStubs indirect stubs to working memory at StubsBlockWorkingMem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Stubs will be written as if linked at StubsBlockTargetAddress, with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Nth stub using the Nth pointer in memory starting at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// PointersBlockTargetAddress.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/orcloongarch64/#a712164829894dc640b8434d8a079f1cc">writeIndirectStubsBlock</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;StubsBlockWorkingMem,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> StubsBlockTargetAddress,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executoraddr">ExecutorAddr</a> PointersBlockTargetAddress,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumStubs);</span></CodeLine>
